balanced.insight: Highly refined with excessive sugar and saturated fat, minimal micronutrients, and poor macronutrient balance
cons: Very high in added sugars (36g per 100g)
Low in essential vitamins and minerals

heart_health.insight: Contains high levels of saturated fat, refined carbs, and sodium that directly increase cardiovascular disease risk
cons: High saturated fat (7.8g) raises LDL cholesterol
Trans fats may be present in commercial varieties

muscle_building.insight: Severely lacking in protein with poor amino acid profile, excess empty calories hinder lean mass development
cons: High sugar causes insulin spikes without muscle benefit
Low in BCAAs and essential amino acids

energy.insight: Delivers rapid sugar spike followed by energy crash, lacks sustained fuel from complex carbs or healthy fats
pros: High calorie density for quick fuel
cons: No complex carbs for sustained release

weight_management.insight: Calorie-dense with minimal satiety, high glycemic load promotes fat storage and triggers hunger hormones
cons: Very low fiber (2.1g) provides no fullness
High GI (70) and GL (45) spike insulin
Triggers dopamine response leading to overconsumption

brain_focus.insight: Sugar spike impairs cognitive function, lacks omega-3s and B-vitamins essential for neurotransmitter synthesis

gut_health.insight: Refined flour and high sugar feed harmful gut bacteria, minimal fiber starves beneficial microbiome
cons: Very low fiber (2.1g) for prebiotic effect

blood_sugar.insight: Extremely high glycemic impact causes severe blood glucose spikes and insulin resistance over time
cons: Promotes insulin resistance with regular consumption

bone_joint.insight: Low calcium and vitamin D, high sugar promotes inflammatory processes affecting joint health
cons: Very low calcium relative to needs
Low in vitamin K for bone metabolism

anti_inflammatory.insight: High refined sugar and saturated fat are pro-inflammatory, lacks antioxidants and omega-3s

balanced.insight: Whole grain option with good fiber, decent minerals, low fat, but limited protein diversity and some sodium

heart_health.insight: Cholesterol-free with minimal saturated fat, magnesium supports cardiovascular function, fiber aids cholesterol management
